channel.title: Perlcast
channel.itunes:author: Josh McAdams
channel.itunes:subtitle: Perlcast: Perl News, Reviews, and More
channel.itunes:summary: Perlcast: Weekly Perl news summaries, periodic interviews with the people that keep the Perl community thriving, and regular giveaways of books and software.
channel.itunes:keywords: Perl, News, Programming, Scripting, Development, Computers

item.title: Robert Spier on the Perl NOC
item.description: Perlcast interview with Robert Spier about the Perl Network Operations Center

item.itunes:keywords: Perl, Scripting, NOC, Network Operations Center

item.title: Perlcast Interview with Bob Walsh - 04.11.2006
item.description: This Perlcast interview is with Bob Walsh, the owner of Safari Software, moderator for the Joel on Software: The Business of Software website, and author of "Micro ISV: From Vision to Reality" published by Apress. In the interview we talk about the book and about some of the issues that Micro ISVs face today.
item.author: perlcast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Josh McAdams
item.itunes:keywords: Perl, Micro ISV, Software, Programmer, Business, Technology

item.title: Perlcast Interview with Audrey Tang - 03.28.2006
item.description: The Perlcast interview this week is with Audrey Tang. Audrey is the creator of the Pugs project, maintainter of numerous CPAN modules and general open source contributor
item.author: perlcast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Josh McAdams

item.title: Perlcast Interview with Chia-liang Kao - 03.06.2006
item.description: The Perlcast interview for this week is with Chia-liang, the creator of svk. The interview is conducted by guest interviewers Jose Castro and BooK.
item.author: perlcast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Josh McAdams

item.title: Perlcast Interview with brian d foy - 02.15.2006
item.description: This week, Perlcast is featuring another podcast interview with brian d foy. In this interview we talk about the newly renamed book, "Intermediate Perl". We also discuss a new project that brian is working on, "Mastering Perl". Listen to find out how you can help be a part of this developing book.
item.author: perlcast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Josh McAdams

item.title: Perlcast Interview with Tom Limoncelli - 02.07.2006
item.description: Perlcast interviewed Tom Limoncelli about his book, "Time Management for System Administrators".
item.author: perlcast@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: Josh McAdams

item.itunes:author: Josh McAdams
